name: WoRaGen
description:
WoRaGen (World Random Generator) is a project that started when I asked myself "Would I be able to make a game with a randomly generated world like Minecraft?" and when I managed to do it, continued to program some stuff around it. It doesn't have any kind of challenge or end goal, but I liked what I was able to program so I decided to post it here.

I don't know when I'll update this again, since I already managed to do what I wanted to, but since I had a lot of fun making this some updates will prob come.

If you want to check some ideas that I have that I would think about putting, you can check the public Trello board I created for the game here.

The font used in the game and in this page is Chakra Petch, by Cadson Demak
